Package game.weapons

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    AxeOfGodrick
    Axe of Godrick deals 142 damage with 84% attack accuracy.
    Bomb
    Req 5 A Bomb Weapon that has a special skill that can kill all surrounding actors regardless of type instantly.
    Club
    A hammer type, represented by ! (the exclamation mark), that deals 103 damage with an 80% hit rate.
    ConcussionStaff
    Req 5 ConcussionStaff has a special skill that makes the target fainted for 3 turns When the target has fainted the target will do nothing Special skill only works on targets who are enemies
    GraftedDragon
    Grafted Dragon deals 89 damage with 90% attack accuracy
    GreatKnife
    A dagger type, represented by / (the forward slash), that deals 75 damage with a 70% hit rate.
    Grossmesser
    A curved sword, represented by ? (question mark), carried around by the Heavy Skeletal Swordsman that deals 115 damage with 85% attack accuracy.
    HeavyCrossbow
    A crossbow, represented by }, carried around by the Godrick soldiers.
    PoisonedAxe
    Req 5 PoisonedAxe has a special skill that poisons the target for 3 turns When the target is poisoned the target loses 50 HP every turn Special skill only works on targets who are enemies
    Scimitar
    A curved sword, represented by s (lowercase S), carried around by the Skeletal Bandit that deals 118 damage with 88% accuracy.
    Uchigatana
    A katana type, represented by ")" (the close parenthesis), that is a starting weapon of the Samurai class.
